title: GitHub activity
ForkEvent: Created a fork of {{repo:sanitize;}}
GollumEvent: Changed a wiki page of {{repo:sanitize;}}

IssueCommentEvent.created: Commented on an issue ({{issue:sanitize:replaceGithubEmote;}}) in {{repo:sanitize;}}
IssueCommentEvent.edited: Edited a comment on an issue ({{issue:sanitize:replaceGithubEmote;}}) in {{repo:sanitize;}}
IssueCommentEvent.deleted: Removed comment on an issue ({{issue:sanitize:replaceGithubEmote;}}) in {{repo:sanitize;}}
IssueCommentEvent.unknown: An unknown IssueCommentEvent action has occurred

IssuesEvent.opened: Opened a new issue ({{issue:sanitize:replaceGithubEmote;}}) in {{repo:sanitize;}}
IssuesEvent.edited: Edited an issue ({{issue:sanitize:replaceGithubEmote;}}) in {{repo:sanitize;}}
IssuesEvent.closed: Closed an issue ({{issue:sanitize:replaceGithubEmote;}}) in {{repo:sanitize;}}
IssuesEvent.unknown: An unknown IssuesEvent action has occurred

PublicEvent: The repo {{repo:sanitize;}} has been made public

PullRequestEvent.unknown: An unknown PullRequestEvent action has occurred
PullRequestEvent.subtitle: {{title:sanitize:replaceGithubEmote;}} ({{changed_files}} {{changed_files; 1:file; default:files}} changed)

PullRequestReviewEvent: Left a review on {{pull_request:sanitize:replaceGithubEmote;}} in {{repo:sanitize;}}
PullRequestReviewCommentEvent: Left a comment on a review of a pull request ({{pull_request:sanitize:replaceGithubEmote;}}) in {{repo:sanitize;}}
